info.name: Tumblr - Apocalypse [animated] theme
info.description:
This theme heavily relies on images, transitions and animations, so allow it to load first time and there's a chance it may lag if your PC isn't too great.

****NEW**** Static (non-animated) version of this theme go here: https://userstyles.org/styles/103500/


Works better in Chrome than FireFox.
Preview in gif form: http://i.imgur.com/0KgtJun.gif

Heavily inspired by Kavaeric's concept: http://quantumeagle.tumblr.com/post/24062133619/

My tumblr: http://stinking.tumblr.com
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATES

October 2014
~A few appearance updates
~Updated for the new dashboard (30/10/14)

August 2014
~Edited to match Tumblr's update.

July 2014
~Updated code to match tumblr's update
~New non-animated version of the theme here: https://userstyles.org/styles/103500/

March 2014
~Fixed a few things including the search page.

November 2013
~Fixed customize button
~Updated for newer dashboard

October 2013
~Updated for new dashboard look

Sept 2013
~Removed unnecessary black border surrounding posts
~Added torn effect to post edges (works in webkit(chrome) only)
~Queue button now supported
